snippet.title: Infinity Blade III Reborn Trailer
snippet.description:
Official announcement trailer for ChAIR's Infinity Blade III, the epic conclusion to the Infinity Blade series. Now available on the App Store.

Please subscribe to our YouTube channel: http://epic.gm/yt

Download Infinity Blade games & books: http://appstore.com/infinityblade
Visit the official Infinity Blade site: http://infinityblade.com
Like us on Facebook: http://epic.gm/ibfb
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/infinityblade
See behind-the-scene pics on Instagram: http://instagram.com/#infinityblade
